scripts.build: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
scripts.pack:chrome: mkdir -p release && rm -f release/focusdeck-chrome-v$npm_package_version.zip && cd dist/chrome && zip -r ../../release/focusdeck-chrome-v$npm_package_version.zip . -x '*.map'
scripts.pack:firefox: mkdir -p release && rm -f release/focusdeck-firefox-v$npm_package_version.zip && cd dist/firefox && zip -r ../../release/focusdeck-firefox-v$npm_package_version.zip . -x '*.map'
scripts.pack: npm run pack:chrome && npm run pack:firefox
